column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Regina - Thank you so much for the great review! I'm happy you decided to give ramen a try
column2: and even happier that you enjoyed our fare. When we opened almost two years ago
column3: we weren't sure how Houstonians would respond. But after almost 1
column5: I think we're officially part of the Houston Foodie Landscape. Thank you again
column6: and we hope to serve you again in the near future.
